title: no ip boost weekend
body: i have an ip boost i brought yet i don't get 2 of them thats unfair

replies.body:
Hey there,

Can you be more specific, did you purchase a time based IP boost? or a win based IP boost?

I'd recommend [contacting Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) about this issue as they're the only ones who can assist with account specific inquiries.
